description: New inmates at Isle of Man Prison are being isolated for 14 days during the coronavirus pandemic.
title: Coronavirus: New Isle of Man inmates confined to cells for two weeks
title_page: Coronavirus: New Isle of Man inmates confined to cells for two weeks - BBC News
maintext: Under the prison lockdown, those on the isolation wing are entitled to two showers a week and are provided with activity packs and exercises they can do in their cells.
